params.account: Address of the account to get the balance value of.

returns._0: Value of the {src} token balance denoted in {dst} tokens.

getPriceFor(address,address).details: It tries to use ETH as a pass through asset if the direct pair is not supported.

returns._0: uint256 The latest answer as given from Chainlink.

params.srcAmount: Amount of the source token to convert into the destination token.

returns._0: uint256 Value of the source token amount in destination tokens.

params.account: Address to give the {role} to. Requirements:  - Sender must be role admin.
params.role: Encoding of the role to give.
Encoding of the role to check.
Encoding of the role to remove.

params.account: Address to remove the {role} from. Requirements:  - Sender must be role admin.
params.role: Encoding of the role to remove.

getBalanceOfFor(address,address,address).notice: It calculates the value of the {src} token balance in {dst} token for the {account}.

getPriceFor(address,address).notice: It returns the price of the token pair as given from the Chainlink Aggregator.

getValueFor(address,address,uint256).notice: It calculates the value of a token amount into another.

grantRole(bytes32,address).notice: Grants an account a new role.

hasRole(bytes32,address).notice: Checks if an account has a specific role.

renounceRole(bytes32).notice: Removes a role from the sender.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).notice: Removes a role from an account.
